text: Benjamin Flores Jr, (born July 24, 2002 in Memphis, Tennessee) is an American actor. He is best known for his lead role as Louie Preston in The Haunted Hathaways, and also as Triple G in the Nickelodeon show Game Shakers. == Filmography == === Movies === Year Title Character Notes 2017 Hey Arnold! - The Jungle Movie Gerald Johanssen voice, TV Movie 2017 Pup Star: Better 2Gether M.
